entry.tran: 令人高兴的;使人愉快的;给人快乐的
entry.def: If you describe something or someone as delightful, you mean they are very pleasant.

example.ex: It was the most delightful garden I had ever seen...
example.tran: 这是我所见过的最惹人喜爱的花园。

example.ex: She remembered Lucy as beautiful, charming and absolutely delightful.
example.tran: 她记得的露西漂亮、迷人，而且非常讨人喜欢。

sentences.sentence: "the farm house, though in itself a small one, is delightfully situated"
